Text: I'm sorry to inform fans downloading this torrent that it has severe skips. For me (seeking "Lovely To See You Again") it only played the first 30 sec or so, then skipped, then a moment later just started playing the next song. I tried to repair the MP3 file using "MP3Trimmer" (by deepNiner) and it informed me this file was unrepairable. I also discovered track 3 skipped badly, and so I'm discarding this entire torrent. Thanks to the uploader, but curses to the ripper for a crappy job.
